requirements.name: Fix Errors
requirements.requirement: All errors in the Debugging Exercise project have been corrected.
requirements.inverse: The Debugging Exercise project contains unresolved errors.

requirements.name: Debugging Document
requirements.requirement: The debugging questionnaire has been completed.
requirements.inverse: The debugging questionnaire has not been completed correctly.

requirements.name: String to Int
requirements.requirement: The stoi() method was used to convert string input to an integer.
requirements.inverse: The stoi() method was not used to convert string input to an integer.

requirements.name: String to Double
requirements.requirement: The stod() method was used to convert string input to a double.
requirements.inverse: The stod() method was not used to convert string input to a double.

requirements.name: String to Float
requirements.requirement: The stof() method was used to convert string input to a float.
requirements.inverse: The stod() method was not used to convert string input to a float.

requirements.name: String to Unsigned Integer
requirements.requirement: The stoul() method was used to convert string input to an unsigned integer.
requirements.inverse: The stoul() method was used to convert string input to an unsigned integer.

requirements.name: String to Unsigned Long
requirements.requirement: The stoull() method was used to convert string input to an unsigned long.
requirements.inverse: The stoull() method was used to convert string input to an unsigned long.

requirements.name: Cast Double to Float
requirements.requirement: Double input value converted to float using a cast.
requirements.inverse: Double input value was not converted to float using a cast.

requirements.name: Cast Float to Int
requirements.requirement: Float input value converted to an integer using a cast.
requirements.inverse: Float input value was not converted to an integer using a cast.

requirements.name: Integer to String
requirements.requirement: Integer input value converted to a string using the to_string() method.
requirements.inverse: Integer input value was not converted to a string using the to_string() method.
